DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal of this project is to establish a pilot study to develop and refine an intervention to promote consumption of fish low in mercury and high in n-3 PUFA among pregnant women. The investigators will demonstrate our ability to recruit pregnant women, influence their fish consumption, and measure changes in nutrient and toxicant biomarkers.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Fish Intake Advice in Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: age 18 years or older Currently pregnant 1222 weeks Singleton pregnancy Consuming fish <=2 times per month Inability to answer questionnaires in English Plans to leave study area prior to delivery Would never eat fish (e.g. vegan, allergy to fish)
